ygData.subject: Re: A little off topic but...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Here Here.  All the adjective-noun names ... does no one have any spark of originality in them?  Does no one have the desire to attempt to be a bit
ygData.messageBody:
--- Avron <avron@...> wrote:
> Actually all the two-word silly lastnames are
> overused, if you can, try and think up a real
> dwarvish lastname..

Here Here. All the adjective-noun names ... does no
one have any spark of originality in them? Does no
one have the desire to attempt to be a bit different?

Color-weapon or celestial body (Bluedirk, Redsword,
Whiteblade, Azuremoon, Greenstar)
Good Quality-weapon or bodypart (Ironblade,
Steelheart, Stronglegs)

Always the same...

===
:D
Dave's World
-No matter where you go, there you are-
"People will believe a lie either because they want to
believe it's true, or because they fear it is." Wizard's
First Rule, Sword of Truth, Terry Goodkind
